To the people having problems with Leopard, I suspect it may be the same problem Starcraft and Diablo 2 players are having. With update 10.5.3, Apple just kind of got rid of 256 colors mode, which I assume this game uses, given it's age. See this topic for some more info, and I'll post if the game ever finishes downloading. 
http://forums.macrumors.com/showthread.php?t=490676
Make sure to read the entire topic.
I'm only getting about 10 KB/s, so if anybody wants to up the UL speed, I'd be very grateful.
Alright, the download finished and the game worked. I think the problem you guys are having is the same as the SC and D2 folks were. Check the topic I gave.
Your problem is that leopard no longer has 256-bit colour, you need to download the update from apple.

** BE VERY CAREFUL WITH THE 256 COLOUR UPDATE ** 

Like a dickhead, I forgot that my 2008 Macbook White has the GMA X3100 chipset, and the NOT NVIDIA, which the update supports. 

If you install the 256 colour update on the wrong Macbook, as far as I'm aware you'll have goosed your card's settings and have to reinstall OS X.
